name: CPInformationTemplate
desc: A template that provides information for a point of interest, food order, parking location, or charging location.

items.name: init(title: String, layout: CPInformationTemplateLayout, items: [CPInformationItem], actions: [CPTextButton])
items.desc: Creates an information template that displays the provided items using the chosen layout.

items.name: var layout: CPInformationTemplateLayout
items.desc: The layout that the template uses to arrange its items.

items.name: enum CPInformationTemplateLayout
items.desc: The layout that an information template uses to arrange its items.

items.name: var items: [CPInformationItem]
items.desc: The items that the template displays.

items.name: class CPInformationItem
items.desc: A data object that provides content for an information template.

items.name: class CPInformationRatingItem
items.desc: A data object that provides rated content for an information template.

items.name: var actions: [CPTextButton]
items.desc: The actions that the template displays.
